Name: maximize_feature_value
Description: Maximize the sum of priorities for all completed features.

Name: maximize_story_points_per_sprint
Description: Maximize the sum of story points for all user stories completed in a sprint.

Name: minimize_total_effort
Description: Minimize the sum of estimated effort for all planned features in a release.

Name: maximize_team_velocity
Description: Maximize the team's average velocity over a series of sprints.

Name: minimize_blocker_resolution_time
Description: Minimize the time it takes to resolve blockers from detection to resolution.

Name: maximize_stakeholder_satisfaction
Description: Maximize value for stakeholders with high influence by prioritizing their features.

Name: maximize_sprint_goal_achievement
Description: Maximize the achievement status of sprint goals.

Name: minimize_project_duration
Description: Minimize the overall project duration by bringing the end date forward.

Name: maximize_team_satisfaction
Description: Maximize the reported team satisfaction in sprint retrospectives.

Name: minimize_budget_consumption
Description: Minimize the spending against the total allocated budget for a project.

Name: maximize_task_completion_rate
Description: Maximize the number of tasks with the status 'done' within a sprint.

Name: maximize_epic_priority
Description: Maximize the sum of priorities for all epics being worked on.
